overview: Boy, have we got a treat for you. It's our contract star, Ashlynn Brooke, getting wild & rowdy in five hot new scenes! Watch her bounce on Tommy Gunn's one-eyed cleaver, then get pounded by Mark Wood in the beaver. After that, watch her get it just the way she likes it from Ramon Nomar, Jordan Ash, and Marco Banderas. She's just a simple southern girl that loves to show her skills, so she'll do whatever it takes to pay the bills!
tagline: 5 Hot New Scenes with Ashlynn Brooke
title: All About Ashlynn
